short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the hyperlinks with blue underlined text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superlinks upgrades hyperlinks on simple pages into "superlinks," which are blue underlined text that you can't click.

See https://github.com/jminjie/superlink for more info.
